message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
Thanks for the offer, Alice, but $150 is a bit higher than I'm willing to go. I'm happy to pay $105 for the product.  Let me know what you think.

I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. However, $105 is a bit lower than I was hoping for. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $137.50. Let me know if that's something you'd be interested in.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $137.50 is still a bit high for me. I'm comfortable going up to $115. This is my final offer, let me know if it works for you.

I appreciate your final offer, Bob, but I'm not quite ready to accept $115. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $140. This is my final counteroffer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
